TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EventLogEntryType extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the event type of an event log entry.

span.span: Specifies the event type of an event log entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Тип записи в журнале событий предоставляет дополнительные сведения для записи.The type of an event log entry provides additional information for the entry. Приложения задают тип записи, при их записи в журнал событий.Applications set the entry type when they write the entry to the event log. Каждое событие должно быть одного типа; типы событий, которые нельзя использовать вместе для записи.Each event must be of a single type; the event types cannot be combined for an entry. Средство "Просмотр событий" использует этот тип для определения значка, отображаемого в представлении списка журнала событий.The Event Viewer uses this type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the log. ## Examples В следующем примере кода демонстрируется использование класс, чтобы добавить сведения о запуске события в файл журнала.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to add information about triggered events to a log file. В этом примере `switch` оператор используется для определения типа событий.In this example, a `switch` statement is used to determine the event type. Каждый `case` инструкция использует для указания типа события, получает сообщение и идентификатор, а затем записывает данные в журнал.Each `case` statement uses the to specify the event type, gets the message and ID, and then writes the information to the log. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntryType_6#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntryType_6/CPP/eventlogentrytype_6.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntryType_6#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntryType_6/CS/eventlogentrytype_6.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntryType_6#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntryType_6/VB/eventlogentrytype_6.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType Error = int32(1)

summary.span: This indicates a significant problem the user should know about; usually a loss of functionality or data.

span.span: This indicates a significant problem the user should know about; usually a loss of functionality or data.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType FailureAudit = int32(16)

summary.span: This indicates a security event that occurs when an audited access attempt fails; for example, a failed attempt to open a file.

span.span: This indicates a security event that occurs when an audited access attempt fails; for example, a failed attempt to open a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType Information = int32(4)

summary.span: This indicates a significant, successful operation.

span.span: This indicates a significant, successful operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType SuccessAudit = int32(8)

summary.span: This indicates a security event that occurs when an audited access attempt is successful; for example, logging on successfully.

span.span: This indicates a security event that occurs when an audited access attempt is successful; for example, logging on successfully.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType Warning = int32(2)

summary.span: This indicates a problem that is not immediately significant, but that may signify conditions that could cause future problems.

span.span: This indicates a problem that is not immediately significant, but that may signify conditions that could cause future problems.
